bot.pinyin: nín hǎo, huān yíng dào xīn xué yuàn.
bot.english: Hello, welcome to the new academy.

user.pinyin: nǐ hǎo, hěn gāo xìng dào zhè lǐ.
user.english: Hi, I'm happy to be here.

bot.pinyin: qǐng wèn nín xìng shén me?
bot.english: May I ask what your surname is?

user.pinyin: wǒ xìng <nǐ de xìng>.
user.english: My surname is <your surname>.
user.hint: Swap in your actual family name.

bot.pinyin: nǐ de míng zi shì shén me?
bot.english: What is your given name?

user.pinyin: wǒ jiào <nǐ de míng zi>.
user.english: I am called <your name>.
user.hint: Use the full name you go by.

bot.pinyin: nǐ cóng nǎ lǐ lái?
bot.english: Where do you come from?

user.pinyin: wǒ cóng <nǐ de chéng shì> lái.
user.english: I come from <your city>.

bot.pinyin: nǐ xiàn zài zhù zài nǎ gè chéng shì?
bot.english: Which city do you live in now?

user.pinyin: wǒ zhù zài <nǐ de zhù zhǐ> chéng shì.
user.english: I live in the city of <where you live>.

bot.pinyin: nǐ de zhí yè shì shén me?
bot.english: What is your profession?

user.pinyin: wǒ shì <nǐ de zhí yè>.
user.english: I am a <your job>.

bot.pinyin: nǐ zài nǎ jiā gōng sī gōng zuò?
bot.english: Which company do you work for?

user.pinyin: wǒ zài <gōng sī míng chēng> gōng zuò.
user.english: I work at <your company>.

bot.pinyin: nǐ huì shuō nǎ xiē yǔ yán?
bot.english: Which languages can you speak?

user.pinyin: wǒ huì shuō Yīng yǔ hé Zhōng wén.
user.english: I can speak English and Chinese.

bot.pinyin: nǐ duì Zhōng wén tīng lǐ jiě zěn me yàng?
bot.english: How is your Chinese listening comprehension?

user.pinyin: wǒ tīng dé dǒng, dàn shì xū yào duō liàn xí.
user.english: I can understand, but I need more practice.

bot.pinyin: nǐ xǐ huān shén me ài hào?
bot.english: What hobbies do you enjoy?

user.pinyin: wǒ xǐ huān xué xīn yǔ yán hé pǎo bù.
user.english: I like learning new languages and jogging.

bot.pinyin: nǐ wèishéme lái cānjiā zhè cì péixùn?
bot.english: Why did you come to this training?

user.pinyin: yīn wèi wǒ xiǎng rèn shi xīn tóng shì hé tí gāo Zhōng wén.
user.english: Because I want to meet new colleagues and improve my Chinese.

bot.pinyin: nǐ duì jīn rì de chéng xù yǒu shé me qī dài?
bot.english: What expectations do you have for today's schedule?

user.pinyin: wǒ qī dài xué dào gōng zuò liú chéng hé wèn tí jiě jué fāng fǎ.
user.english: I expect to learn the workflow and problem-solving methods.

bot.pinyin: nǐ yǐ jīng jiàn guò nǐ de tuán duì ma?
bot.english: Have you already met your team?

user.pinyin: wǒ jiàn guò liǎng gè tóng shì, tā men hěn qǐn fèn.
user.english: I have met two coworkers, and they are very diligent.

bot.pinyin: nǐ xū yào wǒ jiè shào bié de rén ma?
bot.english: Do you need me to introduce you to others?

user.pinyin: qǐng jiè shào shè jì bù de tóng shì gěi wǒ.
user.english: Please introduce me to the colleagues in the design department.

bot.pinyin: nǐ duì jīn tiān de kē chéng ān pái qīng chǔ ma?
bot.english: Are you clear about today's course schedule?

user.pinyin: wǒ kàn guò biǎo gé, jīn wǎn yǒu duì huà huì yì.
user.english: I reviewed the table, and there is a dialogue session tonight.

bot.pinyin: nǐ xiǎng yī qǐ chī wǔ fàn ma?
bot.english: Would you like to eat lunch together?

user.pinyin: hǎo de, wǒ xǐ huān yī biān chī fàn yī biān liáo tiān.
user.english: Sure, I enjoy chatting while eating.

bot.pinyin: nǐ jué dé jīn tiān de zhǔ jiǎng lǎo shī zěn me yàng?
bot.english: How do you feel about today's lead instructor?

user.pinyin: wǒ jué dé tā de shuō míng hěn qīng chǔ.
user.english: I think their explanations are very clear.

bot.pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ jié shù hòu fā zī liào gěi nǐ ma?
bot.english: Can I send you the materials afterward?

user.pinyin: qǐng fā gěi wǒ, wǒ huì zài wǎn shàng fù xí.
user.english: Please send them to me, and I will review them tonight.

bot.pinyin: nǐ xū yào duō shǎo shí jiān zhǔn bèi nǐ de xiàng mù?
bot.english: How much time do you need to prepare your project?

user.pinyin: wǒ xū yào sān tiān shí jiān lái jì huà.
user.english: I need three days to plan it.

bot.pinyin: nǐ měi yuè yào chū chāi ma?
bot.english: Do you travel for work every month?

user.pinyin: wǒ měi yuè chū chāi yí cì, dàn shì kě yǐ tiáo zhěng ān pái.
user.english: I travel once a month, but I can adjust the schedule.

bot.pinyin: nǐ xī wàng wǒ men tí gōng shén me zhī chí?
bot.english: What support do you hope we provide?

user.pinyin: qǐng bāng wǒ lián xì zhōng wén péixùn lǎo shī.
user.english: Please help me connect with the Chinese training teacher.

bot.pinyin: nǐ jiā rén zhī chí nǐ de jué dìng ma?
bot.english: Do your family members support your decision?

user.pinyin: tā men hěn zhī chí bìng qiě gǔ lì wǒ jiān chí.
user.english: They strongly support me and encourage me to persist.

bot.pinyin: nǐ zhōu mò dǎ suàn zěn me fàng sōng?
bot.english: How do you plan to relax this weekend?

user.pinyin: wǒ dǎ suàn kàn shū hé liàn xí kǒu yǔ.
user.english: I plan to read books and practice speaking.

bot.pinyin: nǐ huì yuàn yì bāng zhù xīn péng yǒu liàn xí duì huà ma?
bot.english: Would you be willing to help new friends practice dialogues?

user.pinyin: wǒ yuàn yì, yīn wèi yǔ huì shì zuì hǎo de fāng shì.
user.english: I'm willing, because conversation is the best method.

bot.pinyin: hěn gǎn xiè nǐ de fēn xiǎng, wǒ men huì zài xià yí jié kè shàng jiàn.
bot.english: Thank you for sharing; we'll meet in the next class.

user.pinyin: xiè xiè nǐ de bāng zhù, dào shí jiàn.
user.english: Thank you for your help, see you then.
